name: RM - Future - Cyberpunk (Classic)
prompt: gritty cyberpunk city aesthetic of {prompt} . high tech low life, neon rain, towering skyscrapers, holographic ads, wet streets, jagged digital artifacts, Blade Runner atmosphere
negative_prompt: sunny, bright, nature, clean, utopia, medieval, wood, stone

name: RM - Future - Synthwave (Outrun)
prompt: retro 80s synthwave style art of {prompt} . neon grids, magenta and cyan color palette, retro-futuristic sun, wireframe graphics, chrome reflections, vaporwave aesthetic, dreamlike
negative_prompt: realistic, rusty, dirty, beige, earth tones, gritty, low contrast

name: RM - Future - Steampunk
prompt: intricate steampunk design of {prompt} . brass gears, copper pipes, steam powered machinery, victorian fashion, leather straps, clockwork mechanisms, industrial fantasy
negative_prompt: plastic, neon, digital, modern, sci-fi, sleek, clean, minimalist

name: RM - Future - Dieselpunk
prompt: heavy dieselpunk illustration of {prompt} . 1940s war aesthetic, grime, oil stains, steel plating, rivets, internal combustion engines, smog, industrial warfare vibe
negative_prompt: clean, eco-friendly, solar, bright, magic, fantasy, delicate

name: RM - Future - Solarpunk
prompt: optimistic solarpunk concept art of {prompt} . sustainable technology, art nouveau architecture integrated with nature, lush greenery, solar panels, stained glass, bright sunlight, utopian
negative_prompt: pollution, grime, dark, dystopian, rusty, industrial, cyberpunk, neon

name: RM - Future - Biopunk
prompt: visceral biopunk art of {prompt} . organic technology, flesh and metal fusion, genetic engineering, Cronenberg aesthetic, wet textures, pulsating veins, eerie
negative_prompt: clean, mechanical, dry, robot, hard edges, standard sci-fi

name: RM - Future - Atompunk
prompt: retro 1950s atompunk art of {prompt} . space age design, tailfins, chrome curves, rayguns, googie architecture, optimistic retro-future, Fallout pre-war aesthetic
negative_prompt: gritty, cyberpunk, dark, digital, flat screens, modern, rusty

name: RM - Future - Cassette Futurism
prompt: lo-fi cassette futurism art of {prompt} . late 70s sci-fi aesthetic, chunky analog technology, CRT monitors with green text, beige plastic, magnetic tape, Alien (1979) tech style
negative_prompt: touchscreens, holograms, sleak, blue led, modern, 4k, high resolution

name: RM - Future - Y2K Aesthetic
prompt: early 2000s Y2K aesthetic art of {prompt} . translucent colored plastic, blobject design, metallic chrome, iridescent textures, matrix code, optimistic digital era vibe
negative_prompt: grunge, rusty, warm tones, wood, vintage, retro 80s

name: RM - Future - Post-Apocalyptic
prompt: desolate post-apocalyptic landscape of {prompt} . overgrown ruins, decay, rust, scavenged items, survivalist gear, muted earth tones, Last of Us aesthetic
negative_prompt: clean, new, shiny, intact, bustling city, neon, futuristic
